name: Loaded Dice (Xeok, Psonbre, Philou213)
description:
PLEASE READ DESCRIPTION Loaded Dice

Loaded dice is a rogue-lite platformer where your stats are determined by a roll of dice.  Every time you kill an enemy you have a chance to gain and roll a dice, your statistics will then be altered according to where your dice lands. At the end of every level you will be able to buy upgrades for your die.  Good luck!

Controls
  • WASD for movement, you can double jump
  • Aim and shoot with the mouse
  • Drag and drop items from the shop to buy / use them
/!\ Known Bugs /!\

The level generation is somewhat buggy and will sometime not load correctly. We could not fix this bug in time for the Game Jam but we will release an update after the voting period is over!
